SEARCH
Package repository

Class BaseRepository<T extends model.BaseModel>

java.lang.Object
repository.BaseRepository<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the model that the repository holds, which extends BaseModel.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentRepository, InventoryRepository, MedicalRecordRepository, UserRepository
public abstract class BaseRepository<T extends model.BaseModel> extends Object implements IRepository<T>
Base repository class that provides basic CRUD operations for managing items in a repository. This class is abstract and intended to be extended by concrete repository classes.
Since:
2024-11-17

    • save

      public T save(T item)
      Saves an item to the repository. If the item does not have an ID, a new one is generated. The item is persisted to the file.
      Specified by:
      save in interface IRepository<T extends model.BaseModel>
      Parameters:
      item - the item to save.
      Returns:
      the saved item, with its ID updated if necessary.

    • save

      public List<T> save(List<T> collection)
      Saves a collection of items to the repository. Items without IDs are assigned new IDs. The items are persisted to the file.
      Specified by:
      save in interface IRepository<T extends model.BaseModel>
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection of items to save.
      Returns:
      the saved collection, with IDs updated if necessary.
